official_title: To designate the headquarters building of the Department of Education in Washington, DC, as the Lyndon Baines Johnson Federal Building.

summary.text: Designates the headquarters building of the Department of Education located at 400 Maryland Avenue S.W., Washington, D.C., as the Lyndon Baines Johnson Federal Building.

titles.title: To designate the headquarters building of the Department of Education in Washington, DC, as the Lyndon Baines Johnson Federal Building.
